ground_truth: Javert is puzzled. Valjean and Javert hurry out across the factory yard and down the muddy track beyond to discover a heavily laden cart has toppled onto the cart driver, Fauchelevent, the worker seen before taking a rest on a crate. The cart driver and the Foreman are trying to lift the cart off the crushed man, but it is too heavy, and the ground is too soft. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all hurry to help, but they cannot get a proper purchase in the spongy ground. Fauchelevent screams as the cart slowly sinks in the mud. He throws himself under the cart at this higher end and braces himself to lift it from beneath. At one end, the wheels of the cart have stopped sinking because the ground is harder here. Valjean goes to help Fauchelevent. Valjean holds Javert's gaze, challenging him to say more. Javert is not yet confident enough to continue. Fantine presses on down the steps, trying to ignore the sailors. They spot Fantine, mistaking her for a whore. The sailors then see whores start to appear from the shadows of warehouse doorways. The few men in the street choose their whores and disappear by the end of the chorus. A man selling dentures stands by his cart and we hear fragments of his sales pitch. Fantine walks down the steps with short hair, mocked by the voices of the whores on either side. Fantine heads to the tooth man. A pimp and the head whore watch her progress as the organ-grinder grinds out the music. Fantine looks towards the tooth man and the head whore. The pimp pushes her down. She grabs Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to inspect her teeth. She opens her mouth, and the pincers go in as everyone gathers round to watch. Fantine screams as the first tooth is removed. The pimp is passing among the whores, checking that they are all fit for business. He moves in on Fantine. Fantine looks up, a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth. The whores cluster around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their world. On the rotting warship, more whores appear out of the gaps of the hull to sing the chorus. Whore 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The whores perform for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head whore, as the head whore leads her towards the hulk. Whores sing from the warehouse doorways, from on top of the spars of the ships, writhing around figureheads and from the rotting ship. The pimp leads the captain down the middle of the whores to Fantine who wears a filthy white dress.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Javert is bewildered. Valjean and Javert rush out across the mill courtyard and down the soggy path beyond to find a heavily burdened wagon has overturned onto the wagon driver, Fauchelevent, the laborer observed before taking a break on a crate. The wagon driver and the Foreman are attempting to raise the wagon off the crushed individual, but it is too weighty, and the soil is too pliable. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's aide all hasten to assist, but they cannot obtain a proper grip in the squishy earth. Fauchelevent shrieks as the wagon gradually descends in the muck. He hurls himself under the wagon at this higher end and steadies himself to elevate it from underneath. At one end, the wheels of the wagon have ceased descending because the terrain is firmer here. Valjean proceeds to aid Fauchelevent. Valjean maintains Javert's stare, daring him to speak further. Javert is not yet assured enough to proceed. Fantine advances down the stairs, striving to disregard the mariners. They notice Fantine, misjudging her for a harlot. The mariners then see harlots begin to emerge from the dimness of depot entrances. The few men in the avenue select their harlots and vanish by the conclusion of the refrain. A man vending dentures stands by his wagon and we hear snippets of his sales pitch. Fantine descends the stairs with cropped hair, ridiculed by the voices of the harlots on either side. Fantine moves towards the tooth man. A procurer and the chief harlot observe her advancement as the organ-grinder churns out the melody. Fantine glances towards the tooth man and the chief harlot. The procurer shoves her down. She grasps Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to examine her teeth. She opens her mouth, and the pincers enter as everyone gathers around to observe. Fantine screeches as the initial tooth is extracted. The procurer is moving among the harlots, verifying that they are all suitable for trade. He approaches Fantine. Fantine gazes up, a rivulet of blood in one corner of her mouth. The harlots cluster around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their world. On the decaying vessel, more harlots emerge out of the crevices of the hull to sing the refrain. Harlot 3 nibbles her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The harlots perform for the benefit of Fantine on the commands of the chief harlot, as the chief harlot guides her towards the hulk. Harlots sing from the depot entrances, from atop the spars of the ships, writhing around figureheads and from the decaying ship. The procurer leads the skipper down the center of the harlots to Fantine who wears a grimy white attire.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Javert is puzzled. Valjean and Javert hurry out across the factory yard and down the muddy track beyond to discover that a heavily laden cart has been toppled onto Fauchelevent, the driver of the cart who was seen before taking a rest on a crate. The Foreman and the cart driver are trying to lift the cart off the crushed man, but it is too heavy, and the ground is too soft. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all hurry to help, but a proper purchase cannot be gotten by them in the spongy ground. Fauchelevent screams as the cart slowly sinks in the mud. He throws himself under the cart at this higher end and braces himself to lift it from beneath. At one end, the wheels of the cart have been stopped from sinking because the ground is harder here. Fauchelevent is helped by Valjean. Javert's gaze is held by Valjean, who challenges him to say more. Enough confidence is not yet had by Javert to continue. Fantine presses on down the steps, trying to ignore the sailors. Fantine is spotted by them, and she is mistaken for a whore. Whores are then seen by the sailors appearing from the shadows of warehouse doorways. The few men in the street choose their whores and disappear by the end of the chorus. By his cart stands a man selling dentures, and fragments of his sales pitch are heard. Fantine walks down the steps with short hair, mocked by the voices of the whores on either side. The tooth man is headed to by Fantine. A pimp and the head whore watch her progress as music is ground out by the organ-grinder. The tooth man and the head whore are looked towards by Fantine. She is pushed down by the pimp. Fantine's cheeks are grabbed by her, and her mouth is forced open to inspect her teeth. Her mouth is opened, and the pincers are put in as a crowd gathers to watch. As the first tooth is removed, Fantine screams. The whores are being passed among by the pimp, checking that they are all fit for business. Fantine is moved in on by him. A trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth is looked up at by Fantine. She is clustered around by the whores, whose hands reach out to draw her into their world. On the rotting warship, more whores appear out of the gaps of the hull to sing the chorus. Whore 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. Fantine is performed for by the whores on the orders of the head whore, as she is led towards the hulk by the head whore. The whores sing from the warehouse doorways, from on top of the spars of the ships, writhing around figureheads and from the rotting ship. The captain is led by the pimp down the middle of the whores to Fantine, who wears a filthy white dress.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Javert is confused. Valjean and Javert rush across the factory yard and down the muddy path to find a cart overturned on the driver, Fauchelevent, seen earlier resting on a crate. The driver and Foreman attempt to lift the cart off him, but it’s too heavy, and the ground is too soft. Valjean, Javert, and his assistant rush to assist, but the soggy earth hinders them. Fauchelevent screams as the cart sinks. He throws himself under the higher end to lift it. The cart stops sinking where the ground is harder. Valjean aids Fauchelevent, challenging Javert with a look, but Javert hesitates. Fantine descends, ignoring sailors who mistake her for a whore. More whores emerge from warehouse shadows as men select companions and vanish by chorus end. A denture seller touts his wares nearby. Fantine, mocked by jeering voices, goes to the tooth man. The head whore and pimp watch as the organ-grinder plays. Fantine reaches the tooth man, is forcefully inspected, and her tooth is removed while onlookers gather. The pimp checks on the whores, approaching Fantine, who bleeds. Whores reach for her, drawing her into their world. On a decaying ship, more whores emerge to sing. Whore 3 uses her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The whores perform for Fantine under the head whore's orders, leading her to the hulk. Whores sing from warehouse doors, ship spars, and the rotting vessel, as the pimp guides the captain to Fantine, who dons a dirty white dress.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Javert is confused. Valjean and Javert rush across the factory yard to find a cart has toppled onto Fauchelevent, the resting worker. The cart driver and Foreman struggle to lift the cart off him, but it's too heavy and the ground too soft. Valjean, Javert, and his assistant attempt to help but cannot gain traction. Fauchelevent screams as the cart sinks. Valjean assists Fauchelevent, holding Javert's challenging gaze. Fantine descends the steps, ignoring sailors who mistake her for a whore. Whores emerge, men choose and vanish by chorus end. A dentures seller pitches nearby. Fantine, with short hair, mocked by whores, approaches the tooth man. The head whore and pimp watch. The pimp pushes Fantine, forcing her mouth open to inspect her teeth. Pincers extract her tooth, and she screams. The pimp checks on the whores and targets Fantine. She looks up, blood trickling from her mouth, as whores reach out. On a warship, more whores sing. Whore 3 bites her finger, applying blood as rouge on Fantine's cheeks. The head whore leads Fantine to the hulk, as whores sing from doorways and ships. The pimp guides the captain to Fantine in a filthy white dress.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Javert finds himself completely puzzled and bewildered. Both Valjean and Javert hastily rush out together, crossing the expanse of the factory yard and moving quickly down the muddy, uneven track that lies beyond, only to uncover that a cart, heavily loaded with its burdens, has unfortunately tipped over onto the cart driver, Fauchelevent. Fauchelevent is a worker who had been seen earlier, taking a rest on a crate. The unfortunate cart driver, along with the Foreman, are desperately struggling to lift the massive cart off the poor, crushed man beneath, but their efforts prove futile as the cart remains too heavy to budge and the ground remains frustratingly too soft to provide any support. Valjean, along with Javert and Javert's assistant, all rush forward to offer their help, but they find themselves unable to gain a sufficient grip on the spongy, unstable ground. Fauchelevent cries out in agony as the weight of the cart slowly causes it to sink deeper into the mud. In a bold attempt, he throws himself beneath the cart at the higher end and braces himself, attempting to lift it from underneath. At one end, the wheels of the cart have ceased their sinking motion due to the ground being firmer in that particular spot. Valjean steps in to assist Fauchelevent further. He holds Javert's gaze, daring him to voice any further remarks. Javert, however, is not yet confident enough to assert more. Meanwhile, Fantine descends the steps, attempting to ignore the sailors who mistakenly identify her as a whore. Upon spotting Fantine, the sailors, unbeknownst to them, see actual whores beginning to emerge from the shadowy recesses of warehouse doorways. As the chorus concludes, the few men in the street select their whores and vanish. Nearby, a man selling dentures stands beside his cart, and fragments of his lively sales pitch float through the air. Fantine, now with short hair, walks down the steps, enduring the mockery from the voices of whores on either side. She makes her way towards the tooth man. Observing her progress are a pimp and the head whore, while an organ-grinder churns out music. Fantine gazes towards the tooth man and the head whore. Suddenly, the pimp pushes her down. The head whore takes hold of Fantine's cheeks, forcefully opening her mouth to inspect her teeth. As her mouth opens, pincers are inserted, and onlookers gather around, watching intently. Fantine lets out a scream as her first tooth is extracted. The pimp prowls among the whores, inspecting them to ensure they are all fit for business. He advances towards Fantine. Fantine looks up, with a small trickle of blood seen at one corner of her mouth. The whores cluster around her, with hands reaching out and attempting to draw her into their world. On the decaying warship, more whores emerge from gaps in the hull to join in singing the chorus. One of the whores, Whore 3, bites her fingertip and uses her own blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The whores, under the orders of the head whore, perform for Fantine's benefit, all while the head whore leads her toward the hulk. The sound of whore songs echoes from the warehouse doorways, on top of the ship's spars, winding around figureheads, and from the rotting ship itself. The pimp, with a commanding presence, leads the captain down the path of whores to where Fantine stands, wearing a dirty, disheveled white dress.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Javert finds himself in a state of complete puzzlement and bewilderment, unable to comprehend the situation that is unfolding before him. Both Valjean and Javert, in a hastened manner, rush out together, their feet moving briskly across the broad expanse of the factory yard. They continue quickly down the muddy, uneven track that lies just beyond the yard. It is here, upon this treacherous track, that they uncover a tragic scene: a cart, heavily loaded with its burdens, has unfortunately tipped over onto the cart driver, Fauchelevent. Fauchelevent, a worker who had been observed earlier taking a rest on a crate, is now in a dire predicament. The unfortunate cart driver, who is caught beneath the massive weight of the cart, along with the Foreman, are both desperately struggling with all their might to lift the overwhelming mass off the poor, crushed man beneath it. However, their efforts prove to be utterly futile, as the cart remains too heavy for them to budge, and the ground underneath them remains frustratingly soft, failing to provide any support. Valjean, accompanied by both Javert and Javert's assistant, rushes forward with the intent to offer their assistance, but they find themselves similarly challenged. The spongy and unstable ground makes it nearly impossible for them to gain a sufficient grip. As Fauchelevent cries out in agony, the weight of the cart slowly causes it to sink even deeper into the mud. In a bold and daring attempt, Fauchelevent throws himself beneath the cart at the higher end and braces himself, exerting all his strength as he attempts to lift it from underneath. At one end, the wheels of the cart have fortunately ceased their sinking motion, thanks to the ground being somewhat firmer in that particular spot. Valjean steps in, determined to assist Fauchelevent even further. He holds Javert's gaze with intensity, daring him to voice any further remarks. Javert, however, is not yet confident enough to assert more at this moment. Meanwhile, Fantine cautiously descends the steps, doing her utmost to ignore the sailors who mistakenly identify her as a whore. In the sailors' line of sight, though they remain unaware, actual whores begin to emerge from the shadowy recesses of the warehouse doorways. As the chorus concludes, the few men lingering in the street select their whores and quickly vanish with them. Nearby, there is a man selling dentures, standing beside his cart, and fragments of his lively sales pitch float through the air, catching the attention of passersby. Fantine, now with her hair cut short, walks down the steps, enduring the scorn and mockery from the voices of whores on either side of her path. She makes her way purposefully towards the tooth man. Observing her progress are a pimp and the head whore, both watching intently while an organ-grinder churns out music in the background. Fantine gazes towards both the tooth man and the head whore. Suddenly, in an unexpected and forceful action, the pimp pushes her down. The head whore seizes Fantine's cheeks with a firm grip, forcefully opening her mouth to inspect her teeth. As her mouth opens wide, pincers are inserted, and a crowd of onlookers gathers around, watching the scene with rapt attention. Fantine lets out a scream, filled with pain, as her first tooth is extracted from her mouth. The pimp prowls among the whores, his eyes inspecting them to ensure they are all fit for business. His gaze and presence advance toward Fantine. Fantine looks up, with a small trickle of blood visibly seen at one corner of her mouth. The whores cluster around her, with their hands reaching out in an attempt to draw her into their world. On the decaying warship nearby, more whores emerge from the gaps in the hull, joining in to sing the chorus. One of the whores, identified as Whore 3, bites her fingertip and uses her own blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks, giving them a flushed appearance. The whores, under the commanding orders of the head whore, perform for Fantine's benefit, all the while leading her towards the hulk. The haunting sound of whore songs echoes all around, from the warehouse doorways, on top of the ship's spars, winding around the figureheads, and emanating from the rotting ship itself. The pimp, with a commanding presence about him, leads the captain down the path lined with whores to where Fantine stands, clothed in a dirty, disheveled white dress.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Javert is puzzled, his expression a mix of confusion and contemplation as he tries to make sense of the unfolding situation. Meanwhile, Valjean and Javert swiftly exit the factory yard, their pace quickening as they traverse the muddy track beyond. Their destination comes into view: a scene of distress where a heavily laden cart has toppled, pinning the cart driver, Fauchelevent, the very worker who was previously seen taking a restful pause on a crate. The cart driver, alongside the Foreman, is desperately attempting to lift the oppressive weight of the cart off the crushed man, but their efforts are thwarted by its enormous weight and the softness of the ground beneath them. In a bid to assist, Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all rush forward, their intent clear, yet they find themselves struggling, unable to gain the necessary leverage on the spongy earth. Fauchelevent lets out a piercing scream, a sound filled with agony and urgency, as the cart continues its slow descent into the mud. In a bold and desperate maneuver, he throws himself under the higher end of the cart, positioning his body to brace and lift it from beneath. Fortunately, at this end, the wheels have ceased their sinking progression, owing to the harder ground in that area. Valjean moves with determination to assist Fauchelevent, his actions deliberate and resolute. As he does so, he locks eyes with Javert, his gaze unwavering and challenging, daring Javert to voice any further thoughts. However, Javert, not yet possessing the confidence to articulate more, remains silent. Meanwhile, Fantine makes her way down the steps, her focus intent on ignoring the leering sailors nearby. The sailors, however, spot Fantine and, in their misguided assumptions, mistake her for a whore. Soon after, actual whores begin to emerge from the obscurity of warehouse doorways, casting shadows in the dim light. The men dotted along the street make their choices among the whores and gradually vanish from sight by the end of the chorus. Nearby, a man peddling dentures stands beside his cart, his sales pitch echoing intermittently in the background. As Fantine descends the steps, her once flowing hair now cropped short, she endures the mocking jabs of the whores flanking either side of her path. Resolute, she heads toward the tooth man, while the pimp and the head whore observe her progress, the organ-grinder's music providing a grim soundtrack to the scene. Fantine's gaze shifts towards both the tooth man and the head whore, her apprehension palpable. Abruptly, the pimp shoves her down with force, and in a humiliating display, the head whore seizes Fantine's cheeks, prying open her mouth to scrutinize her teeth. With her mouth forcibly opened, the pincers are inserted, drawing a crowd as onlookers gather to witness the grim spectacle. Fantine's scream pierces the air as the first tooth is pulled from her mouth. As this happens, the pimp moves among the whores, conducting his inspection to ensure they are all ready for business, eventually closing in on Fantine. Fantine glances upward, the metallic taste of blood evident from the trickle pooling at the corner of her mouth. The whores surround her, their hands reaching out, pulling her into their world of despair. On a decaying warship nearby, additional whores appear from the gaps in the hull, their voices joining in song for the chorus. One of the whores, identified as Whore 3, bites into her fingertip, using the blood as makeshift rouge on Fantine's cheeks. The whores, under the head whore's direction, perform theatrically for Fantine's benefit, guiding her towards the derelict hulk. Meanwhile, whores sing from multiple vantage points: the shadows of warehouse doorways, the spars of ships, and even the figureheads, their bodies writhing atop the rotting vessel, their voices a haunting chorus. The pimp leads a captain through the throng of whores towards Fantine, who stands amidst them wearing a stained and tattered white dress.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Javert is puzzled as Valjean and he rush across the factory yard and down a muddy track to find a heavily laden cart that has toppled onto Fauchelevent, the cart driver. Despite efforts by the cart driver and the Foreman, the cart remains too heavy to lift from the soft ground. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant join in, but struggle to get a proper hold as Fauchelevent screams in pain while the cart sinks. Valjean positions himself under the cart at a point where the ground is firmer and attempts to lift it, maintaining eye contact with Javert in a silent challenge, which Javert hesitates to accept. Meanwhile, Fantine descends the steps, trying to ignore the sailors who mistake her for a whore. The presence of other whores emerging from the shadows prompts the men to make their choices and leave. A man selling dentures pitches his wares nearby. Mocked by the surrounding whores, Fantine approaches the tooth man. Under the watchful eyes of a pimp and the head whore, the tooth man inspects Fantine's teeth and extracts the first tooth as onlookers gather, causing her to scream in pain. With blood trickling from her mouth, Fantine is drawn into the world of the whores. They apply rouge to her cheeks using Whore 3's blood, and the head whore leads her toward a rotting warship while others sing and perform around her. The pimp escorts the captain through the crowd of singing and writhing whores to Fantine, who is dressed in a filthy white dress.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Javert, a dedicated police inspector noted for his unwavering sense of justice, is puzzled. Valjean and Javert hurry out across the factory yard, a bustling place of industrial activity, and down the muddy track beyond to discover a heavily laden cart has toppled onto the cart driver, Fauchelevent, known in the town for his hardworking nature. The cart driver and the Foreman, who oversees all factory operations, are trying to lift the cart off the crushed man, but it is too heavy, and the ground is too soft due to recent rains. Valjean, who possesses exceptional strength, Javert, and Javert's assistant, a young officer learning the ropes, all hurry to help, but they cannot get a proper purchase in the spongy ground. Fauchelevent screams as the cart slowly sinks in the mud, threatening his life. He throws himself under the cart at this higher end and braces himself to lift it from beneath, demonstrating his resolve to live. At one end, the wheels of the cart have stopped sinking because the ground is harder here, likely supported by buried stones. Valjean goes to help Fauchelevent with an air of determination. Valjean holds Javert's gaze, challenging him to say more, as they share a complicated past. Javert is not yet confident enough to continue, still processing the intense situation. Fantine, who has recently fallen on hard times, presses on down the steps, trying to ignore the sailors, known for their rowdy behavior. They spot Fantine, mistaking her for a whore, a common occurrence for women in her desperate position. The sailors then see whores start to appear from the shadows of warehouse doorways, dark and hidden from the bustling streets. The few men in the street choose their whores and disappear by the end of the chorus, indicating the transactional nature of the scene. A man selling dentures, crucial for those who have lost teeth in an era before modern dentistry, stands by his cart and we hear fragments of his sales pitch. Fantine walks down the steps with short hair, having sold her long locks for money, mocked by the voices of the whores on either side. Fantine heads to the tooth man, hoping to make money by selling her teeth. A pimp, who controls the local sex trade, and the head whore, respected among her peers, watch her progress as the organ-grinder, a common street performer, grinds out the music. Fantine looks towards the tooth man and the head whore, uncertain about her future. The pimp pushes her down, asserting his dominance. She grabs Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to inspect her teeth, checking their value. She opens her mouth, and the pincers go in as everyone gathers round to watch, enthralled by the grim spectacle. Fantine screams as the first tooth is removed, a painful reminder of her desperate situation. The pimp is passing among the whores, checking that they are all fit for business, maintaining control over his enterprise. He moves in on Fantine. Fantine looks up, a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth, a testament to her recent ordeal. The whores cluster around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their world, where survival means losing one's dignity. On the rotting warship, a derelict symbol of forgotten glory, more whores appear out of the gaps of the hull to sing the chorus, their voices echoing the despair of their lives. Whore 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood as rouge to Fantine's cheeks, a gesture of initiation. The whores perform for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head whore, as the head whore leads her towards the hulk, a large abandoned ship beached on the shore. Whores sing from the warehouse doorways, from on top of the spars of the ships, writhing around figureheads, wooden carvings often seen on the prow of ships, and from the rotting ship. The pimp leads the captain, a man of power and authority, down the middle of the whores to Fantine who wears a filthy white dress, a remnant of her lost innocence.

Valjean and Javert hurry out across the factory yard and down the muddy track beyond to discover a heavily laden cart has toppled onto the cart driver Fauchelevent the worker seen before taking a rest on a crate. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. Fantine heads to the tooth man. A pimp and the head whore watch her progress as the organgrinder grinds out the music. Fantine looks towards the tooth man and the head whore. The pimp pushes her down. She grabs Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to inspect her teeth. She opens her mouth and the pincers go in as everyone gathers round to watch. Fantine screams as the first tooth is removed. The pimp is passing among the whores checking that they are all fit for business. He moves in on Fantine. Fantine looks up a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth. The whores cluster around her hands reaching out to draw her into their world. On the rotting warship more whores appear out of the gaps of the hull to sing the chorus. Whore 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The whores perform for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head whore. as the head whore leads her towards the hulk. Whores sing from the warehouse doorways from on top of the spars of the ships writhing around figureheads and from the rotting ship. The pimp leads the captain down the middle of the whores to Fantine who wears a filthy white dress.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Javert is puzzled. Valjean and Javert hurry out across the garden and down the gravel path beyond to discover a heavily laden barrow has toppled onto the baker, Fauchelevent, the gardener seen before taking a rest on a bench. The baker and the Waiter are trying to lift the barrow off the trapped man, but it is too heavy, and the ground is too loose. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all hurry to help, but they cannot get a proper purchase in the sandy ground. Fauchelevent screams as the barrow slowly sinks in the dirt. He throws himself under the barrow at this higher end and braces himself to lift it from beneath. At one end, the wheels of the barrow have stopped sinking because the ground is firmer here. Valjean goes to help Fauchelevent. Valjean holds Javert's gaze, challenging him to say more. Javert is not yet confident enough to continue. Fantine presses on down the alley, trying to ignore the merchants. They spot Fantine, mistaking her for a beggar. The merchants then see beggars start to appear from the alcoves of tavern entrances. The few men in the street choose their beggars and disappear by the end of the chorus. A man selling flowers stands by his stall and we hear fragments of his sales pitch. Fantine walks down the alley with short hair, mocked by the voices of the beggars on either side. Fantine heads to the flower vendor. A thief and the head beggar watch her progress as the violinist plays out the music. Fantine looks towards the flower vendor and the head beggar. The thief pushes her down. She grabs Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to inspect her teeth. She opens her mouth, and the pliers go in as everyone gathers round to watch. Fantine screams as the first tooth is removed. The thief is passing among the beggars, checking that they are all fit for business. He moves in on Fantine. Fantine looks up, a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth. The beggars cluster around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their world. On the rotting barge, more beggars appear out of the cracks of the deck to sing the chorus. Beggar 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks. The beggars perform for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head beggar, as the head beggar leads her towards the vessel. Beggars sing from the tavern entrances, from on top of the masts of the boats, writhing around figureheads and from the rotting barge. The thief leads the quartermaster down the middle of the beggars to Fantine who wears a filthy brown dress.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Javert is perplexed. Valjean and Javert stroll across the factory yard and along the muddy track beyond to witness a heavily laden cart has sailed onto the cart driver, Fauchelevent, the worker seen before reclining on a crate. The cart driver and the Foreman are attempting to nudge the cart off the flattened man, but it is too cumbersome, and the ground is too slippery. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all saunter to aid, but they cannot achieve a firm stance in the mushy ground. Fauchelevent groans as the cart gradually subsides in the mud. He crawls himself under the cart at this elevated end and steadies himself to shove it from beneath. At one end, the wheels of the cart have halted subsiding because the ground is sturdier here. Valjean proceeds to aid Fauchelevent. Valjean holds Javert's gaze, provoking him to inquire more. Javert is not yet assured enough to persist. Fantine descends down the steps, attempting to disregard the sailors. They notice Fantine, confusing her for a beggar. The sailors then observe beggars start to emerge from the shadows of warehouse doorways. The few men in the street select their beggars and vanish by the end of the chorus. A man vending spectacles stands by his cart and we catch fragments of his sales pitch. Fantine walks down the steps with trimmed hair, teased by the voices of the beggars on either side. Fantine proceeds to the spectacles man. A thug and the head beggar eye her progression as the organ-grinder churns out the music. Fantine glances towards the spectacles man and the head beggar. The thug shoves her down. She seizes Fantine's cheeks and forces open her mouth to examine her teeth. She opens her mouth, and the pincers penetrate as everyone gathers around to observe. Fantine shrieks as the first tooth is extracted. The thug is mingling among the beggars, ensuring that they are all prepared for business. He advances on Fantine. Fantine gazes up, a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth. The beggars cluster around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their world. On the decaying vessel, more beggars appear out of the gaps of the hull to chant the chorus. Beggar 3 taps her fingertip and applies her blood to blot Fantine's cheeks. The beggars enact for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head beggar, as the head beggar steers her towards the hulk. Beggars chant from the warehouse doorways, from atop the spars of the ships, writhing around figureheads and from the decaying ship. The thug guides the captain down the middle of the beggars to Fantine who wears a ragged white dress.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The lighthouse is puzzled. Umbrella and Lighthouse hurry out across the garden path and down the dusty road beyond to discover a heavily laden wardrobe has toppled onto the wardrobe maker, Luggage, the gardener seen before taking a rest on a bench. The wardrobe maker and the Librarian are trying to lift the wardrobe off the crushed creature, but it is too heavy, and the ground is too slippery. Umbrella, Lighthouse, and Lighthouse's assistant all hurry to help, but they cannot get a proper purchase in the soggy ground. Luggage screams as the wardrobe slowly sinks in the mud. It throws itself under the wardrobe at this higher end and braces itself to lift it from beneath. At one end, the wheels of the wardrobe have stopped sinking because the ground is firmer here. Umbrella goes to help Luggage. Umbrella holds Lighthouse's gaze, challenging it to say more. Lighthouse is not yet confident enough to continue. Mirror presses on down the steps, trying to ignore the lanterns. They spot Mirror, mistaking it for a ghost. The lanterns then see ghosts start to appear from the shadows of barn doorways. The few vehicles in the street choose their ghosts and disappear by the end of the chorus. A cloud selling watches stands by its wardrobe and we hear fragments of its sales pitch. Mirror walks down the steps with short hair, mocked by the voices of the ghosts on either side. Mirror heads to the watch cloud. A mime and the head ghost watch its progress as the ice cream vendor churns out the music. Mirror looks towards the watch cloud and the head ghost. The mime pushes it down. It grabs Mirror's cheeks and forces open its mouth to inspect its teeth. It opens its mouth, and the pliers go in as everyone gathers round to watch. Mirror screams as the first tooth is removed. The mime is passing among the ghosts, checking that they are all fit for business. It moves in on Mirror. Mirror looks up, a trickle of ink in one corner of its mouth. The ghosts cluster around it, hands reaching out to draw it into their world. On the rotting castle, more ghosts appear out of the gaps of the rampart to sing the chorus. Ghost 3 bites its fingertip and applies its ink to rouge Mirror's cheeks. The ghosts perform for the benefit of Mirror on the orders of the head ghost, as the head ghost leads it towards the castle. Ghosts sing from the barn doorways, from on top of the towers of the castles, writhing around gargoyles and from the rotting castle. The mime leads the explorer down the middle of the ghosts to Mirror who wears a filthy white cloak.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Napoleon is confused. Wellington and Napoleon amble out across the garden path and down the rocky trail beyond to realize a heavily burdened wagon has flipped onto the wagon driver, Lafayette, the cook seen before taking a nap on a bench. The wagon driver and the Gardener are trying to shift the wagon off the trapped man, but it is too cumbersome, and the ground is too slippery. Wellington, Napoleon, and Napoleon's valet all rush to assist, but they cannot find a firm grip on the mushy ground. Lafayette yells as the wagon gradually burrows into the soil. He flings himself beneath the wagon at this higher ledge and braces himself to budge it from under. At one end, the wheels of the wagon have stopped sinking because the terrain is firmer here. Wellington goes to support Lafayette. Wellington holds Napoleon's stare, provoking him to utter more. Napoleon is not yet assured enough to proceed. Cosette strides up the hill, trying to ignore the merchants. They spot Cosette, mistaking her for a seller. The merchants then notice sellers start to emerge from the recesses of warehouse entrances. The few women in the avenue select their sellers and vanish by the end of the chorus. A woman hawking umbrellas stands by her stall and we hear fragments of her sales pitch. Cosette climbs up the hill with cropped hair, teased by the voices of the sellers on either side. Cosette approaches the umbrella woman. A pickpocket and the lead seller watch her advance as the violinist plays out the tune. Cosette gazes towards the umbrella woman and the lead seller. The pickpocket trips her up. She grabs Cosette's shoulders and pries open her purse to inspect her savings. She opens her purse, and the fingers reach in as everyone gathers round to watch. Cosette shouts as the first coin is taken. The pickpocket is wandering among the sellers, ensuring that they are all ready for trade. He sidles over to Cosette. Cosette looks up, a trickle of sweat in one corner of her brow. The sellers gather around her, hands extending to pull her into their circle. On the derelict raft, more sellers appear out of the cracks of the timber to chant the chorus. Seller 3 nibbles her fingernail and smears her saliva to shine Cosette's forehead. The sellers perform for the amusement of Cosette on the orders of the lead seller, as the lead seller guides her towards the barge. Sellers sing from the warehouse entrances, from atop the beams of the boats, swaying around figureheads and from the decaying vessel. The pickpocket escorts the commander down the center of the sellers to Cosette who wears a grimy red coat.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Javert is bewildered. Valjean and Javert dash out across the garden path and up the rocky trail ahead to realize a heavily laden wheelbarrow has flipped onto the wheelbarrow operator, Fauchelevent, the worker noticed earlier lounging on a barrel. The wheelbarrow operator and the Head Chef are attempting to drag the wheelbarrow off the pinned man, but it is too burdensome, and the ground is too mushy. Valjean, Javert, and Javert's assistant all rush to assist, but they cannot get a proper footing in the soggy soil. Fauchelevent wails as the wheelbarrow gradually sinks in the sludge. He throws himself beneath the wheelbarrow at this lower corner and steadies himself to shove it from below. At one side, the axles of the wheelbarrow have halted sinking because the ground is firmer here. Valjean moves to aid Fauchelevent. Valjean holds Javert's stare, daring him to speak further. Javert is not yet assured enough to proceed. Fantine continues on across the deck, attempting to overlook the cooks. They notice Fantine, mistaking her for a beggar. The cooks then see beggars begin to emerge from the shadows of storage alcoves. The few women in the alley select their beggars and vanish by the completion of the tune. A man vending spectacles stands by his wheelbarrow and we catch snippets of his sales pitch. Fantine descends the slope with her hair tied, taunted by the voices of the beggars on either side. Fantine heads to the optics vendor. A hustler and the main beggar observe her advance as the accordionist cranks out the melody. Fantine looks towards the optics vendor and the main beggar. The hustler shoves her down. She grabs Fantine's jaw and pries open her lips to scrutinize her teeth. She opens her mouth, and the tongs go in as everyone gathers round to observe. Fantine cries out as the first molar is extracted. The hustler is circulating among the beggars, verifying that they are all ready for trade. He closes in on Fantine. Fantine gazes upward, a rivulet of saliva in one corner of her mouth. The beggars converge around her, hands reaching out to draw her into their realm. On the decaying steamship, more beggars materialize out of the cracks in the deck to chant the chorus. Beggar 3 bites her knuckle and applies her saliva to tint Fantine's cheeks. The beggars perform for the amusement of Fantine on the directive of the main beggar, as the main beggar guides her towards the vessel. Beggars chant from the storage openings, from on top of the masts of the boats, writhing around statues and from the decaying ship. The hustler guides the lieutenant down the center of the beggars to Fantine who wears a grimy grey cloak.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Baxter is bewildered. Ethan and Baxter dash out across the garden path and up the stony hill ahead to find a fully loaded wheelbarrow has flipped onto the bicycle courier, Sturgis, the gardener glimpsed earlier taking a nap on a bench. The bicycle courier and the Chef are struggling to hoist the wheelbarrow off the trapped person, but it is too cumbersome, and the terrain is too unstable. Ethan, Baxter, and Baxter's apprentice all rush to assist, yet they fail to achieve a firm grip in the marshy terrain. Sturgis shouts as the wheelbarrow gradually buries itself in the muck. He dives beneath the wheelbarrow at this elevated side and steadies himself to hoist it from below. At one end, the wheels of the wheelbarrow have ceased descending because the surface is sturdier here. Ethan goes to assist Sturgis. Ethan holds Baxter's stare, daring him to speak further. Baxter is not quite brave enough to proceed. Miranda steps up the path, striving to disregard the merchants. They notice Miranda, erroneously believing her to be a seamstress. The merchants then observe seamstresses begin to emerge from the recesses of barn entrances. The handful of individuals in the alley choose their seamstresses and vanish by the conclusion of the refrain. A vendor hawking maps stands beside his wagon, and we catch snippets of his sales pitch. Miranda strolls down the path with short locks, taunted by the murmurs of the seamstresses on either side. Miranda approaches the cartographer. A hustler and the lead seamstress observe her advancement as the violist saws out a tune. Miranda glances towards the cartographer and the lead seamstress. The hustler shoves her to the ground. She clasps Miranda's chin and pries open her jaw to examine her incisors. She opens wide, and the tongs enter as the crowd gathers to watch. Miranda cries out as the first molar is pulled. The hustler is weaving through the seamstresses, ensuring they are all ready for transactions. He advances towards Miranda. Miranda glances upward, a rivulet of crimson at one corner of her lips. The seamstresses gather around her, hands reaching out to welcome her into their realm. On the decaying dinghy, additional seamstresses appear from the cracks of the deck to join the chorus. Seamstress 3 nibbles her knuckle and smears her blood to rouge Miranda's cheeks. The seamstresses perform for the amusement of Miranda at the command of the lead seamstress, as the lead seamstress guides her toward the shipwreck. Seamstresses hum from the barn doorways, atop the masts of the vessels, wriggling around figureheads and from the deteriorating dinghy. The hustler escorts the skipper down the center of the seamstresses to Miranda, who dons a grimy grey frock.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Javert and Valjean rush to help a cart driver, Fauchelevent, trapped under a toppled cart. Despite their attempts, the cart sinks into the mud, and Valjean aids Fauchelevent, challenging Javert with his determination. Meanwhile, Fantine, mistaken for a prostitute, descends stairs and confronts mockery from onlooking sailors and whores. She approaches a tooth vendor, is overpowered by a pimp, and forcibly has a tooth removed amid jeering spectators. The whores surround Fantine, drawing her into their world while performing suggestively. Fantine, now with blood at the corner of her mouth, is led by the head whore towards a decaying warship as the chorus of whores sings around her.

writhing around figureheads and from the rotting ship as the head whore leads her towards the hulk The whores perform for the benefit of Fantine on the orders of the head whore Whore 3 bites her fingertip and applies her blood to rouge Fantine's cheeks On the rotting warship more whores appear out of the gaps of the hull to sing the chorus The whores cluster around her hands reaching out to draw her into their world Fantine looks up a trickle of blood in one corner of her mouth He moves in on Fantine The pimp is passing among the whores checking that they are all fit for business Fantine pushes her down Fantine looks towards the tooth man and the head whore A pimp and the head whore watch her progress as the organgrinder grinds out the music Fantine heads to the tooth man Fantine toppled onto the cart driver Fauchelevent the worker seen before taking a rest on a crate Javert is puzzled
